system.description:
Prerequisites

Spellschool (Any) 6 Ranks

Benefits

When casting a spell with this modification that has a duration, the mage is able to ’turn off’ the spell’s effects, pausing that duration until the spell returns to being active. It costs 7 combat points to either pause a spell or resume it, and the entire round counts against the duration in either case. Effects that can discern spell effects still perceive the spell when paused. This modification adds 5 SP to the spell’s cost.
system.summary: Toggle spell effects to save turns in use
